name: Meeting the Parents
description:
Meeting the Parents

Will you light a fire in the Sparks' hearts?

Part of a personal challenge, in which I created a short Interactive Fiction working story on Twine in the span of a month. It is a prototype of a story I may try to flesh out further or add further chapter. It is inspired by comedic movies like Meet the Parents.

The story follows you, the player, going through the struggle of meeting your girlfriend's parents for the first time. Will you win them over or will you make a fool of yourself? Only your choices will tell.

The protagonist's gender is up to the reader.

 Go check out my Tumblr for more info on my processes.
